attributes.action: Legal aid to be given to men and women involved in family court.
attributes.additional_details: The government to make Legal aid available to Men as well as women involved in family court with child arrangements and non molestations.
attributes.background: The Government should recognise that domestic abuse is a gender neutral crime and men are the majority of victims of false allegations so women receive legal aid leading to parental alienation from their children causing a pandemic of Male suicides.

rejection.details:
you may like to sign the below petition we currently have open on this topic:

Make legal aid available to all parents in family court cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581981
